oai_dc:dc.dc:title: the Vets Corner: SICK BIRD, DEAD BIRD WHAT CAN YOU DO?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cooper, Ralph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Until recently, there were essentiallythree options open to the average birdfancier:1. Take it in stride as simply bad luck.2. Try to identify the problem with thehelp of experience, reading andfriendly advice.3. If the bird was sufficiently valuableeither monetarily or sentimentally,you might present it to your localveterinarian, if you could find onewho was interested in birds and hadenough experience to help you. Ifthe bird died, he might make a postmortemexamination, applying thosediagnostic techniques which wereavailable to him.
